creator: clm@csse.monash.edu.au
text:
When an XML comment appears as a child of a script element, the content of the
comment is treated as code.

For example,

  <script>
    alert("one <!--two -->three");
  </script>

would show an alert box containing "one two three" when it should show "one three".

I'll attach a whole sample .svg file showing this problem as well as a patch for it.
